sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When a user in the portal choose the Service Category, only 'visiable on portal' categories will appear in the category field (in the record producer)</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>requested</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Stephen Walker">74168f824fa063007e72aa95d310c727</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="INTU" name="INTU">c0f22cde4f6463007e72aa95d310c7f3</assignment_group> <category display_value="Catalogue">b5cd05924f2863007e72aa95d310c7c6</category> <company display_value="INTU">98712c9e4f6463007e72aa95d310c75c</company> <description>Reduce user visible categories - based on categories table, (add field: visable in portal), only show to the ones that are marked to show.</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp>1970-01-01 01:00:00</estimated_hours_sp> <notes/> <number>TAS0001159</number> <package display_value="PACK0001020">88d712514f8523007e72aa95d310c748</package> <short_description>Show fewer categories on portal</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>cancelled</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-08 19:59:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>31099e514f8523007e72aa95d310c74d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-11-02 11:44:40</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
